Hello there.

I wanted to make the game a bit more challenging so I istalled RemoteTech and K-OS.

Now, what I'm missing is the realistic camera. A simple camera you could attach to the crafts body, but with a catch. It can only broadcast when it's in RemoteTechs signal range, making it more realistic. And since you don't need do control it via wasd keys anyways, only via code in K-OS, you don't loose any functionality. I think.

I don't know how hard implementing this would be, but I think it would be pretty cool.

Thank you for your time,

cikamatko

You might look at CCTV WiFi camera http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107397-Kerbal-CCTV-1-1-now-with-WiFi-camera or Hullcam VDS http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365-0-23-Hullcam-VDS-Added-new-cameras-by-Rubber-Ducky-Updated-30-Dec maybe ProbeControlRoom http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67450-WIP-IVA-PLUGIN-ProbeControlRoom-1-0-beta8a-IVA-All-the-things!-new-3D-RPM-17

Perhaps try requesting this feature from the HullCam mod dev. What would you display when there is no connection? Map mode? Maybe this would be nice to have to work with probecontrol rom mod as well. But thats making 3 mods work together
